thread.title: ‘Spooks and Chills’ Coming to Disneyland Resort®
thread.title_full: ‘Spooks and Chills’ Coming to Disneyland Resort®

author: Off to Neverland Travel
title: ‘Spooks and Chills’ Coming to Disneyland Resort®
text:
Request a Quote ‘Spooks and Chills’ Coming to Disneyland Resort® 
Friday, Sep. the 11th will be the official start of Halloween Time at the Disneyland® Resort! That’s right, get ready for “The Happiest Place on Earth” to get spookier! 
The ever popular Mickey’s Halloween Party is returning this year to Disneyla nd® Park. A separate-ticket event, the party turns the park into a celebration of the season as guests wearing their Halloween costumes join Disney characters dressed up in their own festive attire. The 17-nights of trick-or-treating fun at Mickey’s Halloween Party are: Fri. Sep. 25 * = Party runs from 6p – 11p instead of 7p – midnight. 
Highlights of this year’s party include: “Halloween Screams” Fireworks Spectacular Meet and greets with Disney villains and other Disney characters Opportunity for Adults and children to trick-or-treat in costumes throughout the park Access to many of your favorite Disneyland ® Park rides and attractions including Haunted Mansion® Holiday and Space Mountain® Ghost Galaxy 
Tickets for Mickey’s Halloween Party may be purchased in advance by contacting your Magic Maker®. Tickets go on sale for the general public starting Jul. 29th with advanced pricing starting at $69 per person. Disneyland® Resort Annual Passholders, Disney Rewards Visa® Cardmembers, and Disney Vacation Club members are able to start purchasing their tickets on Jul. 22nd. 
Day guests to the Disneyland® Park can still take part in the Halloween Time fun too! As you walk down Main Street, U.S.A.® , admire the Pumpkin Festival with hundreds of unique pumpkins. You will also enjoy holiday overlays on two of your favorite park attractions – Space Mountain® Ghost Galaxy and Haunted Mansion® Holiday. 
Halloween Time runs at Disneyland® Park from Sep. 11-Nov. 1, 2015. 
By | July 16th, 2015 | Categories: Disney News , Disneyland News | | 0 Comments Share This Story, Choose Your Platform!
